update dbo.product_table set Sync_Flag=1;

select getdate();

update dbo.product_table set Sync_Flag=1;

select getdate();

properties.description:
Run a simple Transformation job using Azure Databricks, with a single pane of glass monitoring from ADF.

In the template, we check for source dataset availability. Once it is available we copy it into a blob storage for staging using a Copy activity. The same storage is accessed from Databricks clusters while processing the data (Transformation). The output is stored in the same storage under 'output' folder. Various notebook properties are referenced as expressions using pipeline parameters, which lets you configure more generic and reusable pipelines.

activities.name: Load Blob
activities.description: Copy activity copies the actual files/ dataset to be processed by Databricks into a staging store. This storage should be accessible by the Azure Databricks cluster referenced in the next activity.

activities.name: Transformation
activities.description: Databricks Notebook activity does the processing of the data copied in the previous step (copy activity). Please ensure you have added the databricks notebook (https://adflabstaging1.blob.core.windows.net/share/Transformations.html) in the databricks work-space and referenced it in the notebook activity in ADF.

properties.description: Connection to your destination Azure Blob Store.

Dataset to check if '_success' flag/ file is available in source. If not, the activity fails, indicating that source dataset is not ready.
Context: In Spark/ Hadoop environments, generally users leverage flags to identify if the data has been correctly written through the distributed compute engines. E.g. '_success' defines all nodes have successfully written the data.
Connection to your source files in Azure Blob Store.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 20,
		id
	)) ~> SRCRawUserParquet
SRCRawUserParquet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'sinkdata',
	folderPath: 'LakeHouse/Staging',
	truncate: true,
	mergeSchema: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DSTStagingUserDelta

source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceStaging
source(output(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		added_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceTarget
source(output(
		MaxSurrogateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isNull(max(product_key),0) as MaxSurrogateKey from dbo.product_dim',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxSurrogateKey
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsForUpdate
ExistsForUpdate, sourceTarget lookup(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyAddedDateLookup
ProductKeyAddedDateLookup derive(updated_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> UpdatedDateDerivedColumn
UpdatedDateDerivedColumn alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateAlterRow
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InsertNewRecordExists
InsertNewRecordExists, MaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForSurrogateKey
SurrogateKeyCalculation derive(product_key = MaxSurrogateKey+s_key,
		added_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
JoinForSurrogateKey keyGenerate(output(s_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCalculation
UpdateAlterRow sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		added_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['product_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id = sourceStaging@product_id,
		product_name = sourceStaging@product_name,
		unit_price = sourceStaging@unit_price,
		product_desc = sourceStaging@product_desc,
		eligible_promotion = sourceStaging@eligible_promotion,
		added_date,
		updated_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateSink
DerivedColumns sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		added_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		added_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewsink

source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceStaging
source(output(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceTarget
source(output(
		MaxSurrogateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isNull(max(product_key),0) as MaxSurrogateKey from dbo.product_dim',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> MaxSurrogateKey
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsForUpdate
ExistsForUpdate, sourceTarget lookup(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyAddedDateLookup
ProductKeyAddedDateLookup derive(updated_date = currentTimestamp(),
		is_active = 0) ~> UpdatedDateDerivedColumn
UpdatedDateDerivedColumn alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateAlterRow
sourceStaging, sourceTarget exists(sourceStaging@product_id == sourceTarget@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InsertNewRecordExists
InsertNewRecordExists, MaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForSurrogateKeyNew
SurrogateKeyCalculation derive(product_key = MaxSurrogateKey+s_key,
		added_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
JoinForSurrogateKeyNew keyGenerate(output(s_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCalculation
ExistsForUpdate, MaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinforSurrogateKeyExisting
JoinforSurrogateKeyExisting keyGenerate(output(s_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCalculationExisting
SurrogateKeyCalculationExisting derive(product_key = MaxSurrogateKey+s_key,
		added_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumnExisting
UpdateAlterRow sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['product_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id = sourceStaging@product_id,
		is_active,
		end_date = updated_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateSink
DerivedColumns sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date = added_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertNewsink
DerivedColumnExisting sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		is_active as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_key,
		product_id,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date = added_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertExistingProduct

parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string ('ID'),
	Columns as string ('Player,Team,Salary')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GenericInput
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDimensionTable
AddHashInput, AddHashExisting exists(AddHashInput@id_hash == AddHashExisting@id_hash
	&& AddHashInput@columns_hash == AddHashExisting@columns_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
GenericInput derive(id_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
FilterForActive derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($PrimaryKey,','))),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashExisting
AddHashExisting aggregate(MaxSurrogateKey = max(toInteger(byName('Key')))) ~> GetMaxSurrogateKey
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddKey
AddKey, GetMaxSurrogateKey join(Key == MaxSurrogateKey || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey
JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey derive(Key = Key + MaxSurrogateKey,
		Active = 1,
		ActiveStartTime = currentUTC(),
		ActiveEndTime = toTimestamp(toString(null()))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
AddHashExisting, NewAndUpdatedRows exists(AddHashExisting@id_hash == AddHashInput@id_hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(Active = 0,
		ActiveEndTime = currentUTC()) ~> UpdateObsolete
AddDimensionColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColsInput
MarkAsInsert, DropUnwantedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
UpdateObsolete alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkAsUpdate
MarkAsUpdate select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
DropUnwantedColsInput alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkAsInsert
ExistingDimensionTable filter(toInteger(byName('Active')) == 1) ~> FilterForActive
UnionAllData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($PrimaryKey)],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimensionTableSink
